member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo
member.summary: Provides version information for a physical file on disk.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.Comments
member.summary: Gets the comments associated with the file.
member.returns: The comments associated with the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.CompanyName
member.summary: Gets the name of the company that produced the file.
member.returns: The name of the company that produced the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart
member.summary: Gets the build number of the file.
member.returns: A value representing the build number of the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileDescription
member.summary: Gets the description of the file.
member.returns: The description of the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMajorPart
member.summary: Gets the major part of the version number.
member.returns: A value representing the major part of the version number or 0 (zero) if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileMinorPart
member.summary: Gets the minor part of the version number of the file.
member.returns: A value representing the minor part of the version number of the file or 0 (zero) if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileName
member.summary: Gets the name of the file that this instance of describes.
member.returns: The name of the file described by this instance of .

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FilePrivatePart
member.summary: Gets the file private part number.
member.returns: A value representing the file private part number or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.FileVersion
member.summary: Gets the file version number.
member.returns: The version number of the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a representing the version information associated with the specified file.
member.param: The fully qualified path and name of the file to retrieve the version information for.
member.returns: A containing information about the file. If the file did not contain version information, the contains only the name of the file requested.
member.exception: The file specified cannot be found.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.InternalName
member.summary: Gets the internal name of the file, if one exists.
member.returns: The internal name of the file. If none exists, this property will contain the original name of the file without the extension.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsDebug
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled.
member.returns: if the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled; otherwise, .

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPatched
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the file has been modified and is not identical to the original shipping file of the same version number.
member.returns: if the file is patched; otherwise, .

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPreRelease
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a development version, rather than a commercially released product.
member.returns: if the file is prerelease; otherwise, .

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsPrivateBuild
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the file was built using standard release procedures.
member.returns: if the file is a private build; if the file was built using standard release procedures or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.IsSpecialBuild
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a special build.
member.returns: if the file is a special build; otherwise, .

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.Language
member.summary: Gets the default language string for the version info block.
member.returns: The description string for the Microsoft Language Identifier in the version resource or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.LegalCopyright
member.summary: Gets all copyright notices that apply to the specified file.
member.returns: The copyright notices that apply to the specified file.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.LegalTrademarks
member.summary: Gets the trademarks and registered trademarks that apply to the file.
member.returns: The trademarks and registered trademarks that apply to the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.OriginalFilename
member.summary: Gets the name the file was created with.
member.returns: The name the file was created with or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.PrivateBuild
member.summary: Gets information about a private version of the file.
member.returns: Information about a private version of the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart
member.summary: Gets the build number of the product this file is associated with.
member.returns: A value representing the build number of the product this file is associated with or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart
member.summary: Gets the major part of the version number for the product this file is associated with.
member.returns: A value representing the major part of the product version number or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart
member.summary: Gets the minor part of the version number for the product the file is associated with.
member.returns: A value representing the minor part of the product version number or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductName
member.summary: Gets the name of the product this file is distributed with.
member.returns: The name of the product this file is distributed with or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductPrivatePart
member.summary: Gets the private part number of the product this file is associated with.
member.returns: A value representing the private part number of the product this file is associated with or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ProductVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the product this file is distributed with.
member.returns: The version of the product this file is distributed with or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: P:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.SpecialBuild
member.summary: Gets the special build information for the file.
member.returns: The special build information for the file or if the file did not contain version information.

member.name: M:System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.ToString
member.summary: Returns a partial list of properties in the and their values.
member.returns: A list of the following properties in this class and their values: , , , , , , , , , , , , . If the file did not contain version information, this list will contain only the name of the requested file. Boolean values will be , and all other entries will be .
